title: Protecting Wealth From Inflation
description: The investment community is divided on whether inflation is more than just transitory. According to its latest World Economic Outlook Update, the International Monetary Fund expects inflation to return to its pre-pandemic ranges in most countries in 2022,[1] but uncertainty remains high. How can investors mitigate inflation risks, and what is the role of wealth managers in such an environment?

title: The Merits Of Long-Term Investments
